ygData.msgSnippet: Squizzy:: She got the message and make ready for Kitkat3 to arrive. ... She walked into the lab. I was told you have an upgrade for me. Squizzy:: Yes I do.

Squizzy::
She got the message and make ready for Kitkat3 to arrive.

::KitKat3::
She walked into the lab. "I was told you have an upgrade for me."

Squizzy::
"Yes I do. It's going to help you with your aim in battle and give 
your systems a power boost while fighting.  This should only take a 
minute."  She installed a small chip into KitKat3's cyberbrain stem 
and closed the panel.  Now KitKat3 would recieve messages from Zardus 
and follow his orders without the commlink. "Your all done"

KitKat3::
"Wow, that was fast. OK, well, I'm off. Take care. And keep that CR 
tank ready just in case."  She left the lab and headed for the 
entrance. 
----------------------
Diamond::
She frowned. She didn't want to scout anything. She wanted mechfluid 
on her hands, mainly someone elses. She grudgingly accepted the 
job."Yeah fine. Where do you want me to scout around?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus/FZ::
> 
> Zardus silently replies to KitKat's message. "Yes, I have a mission 
> for you. Can you return to the Pack and unite them back up? They 
have 
> missed your leadership. However, first report to Squizzy, she has 
an 
> upgrade for you."
> 
> He then sends a message to Squizzy, which read: "Squizzy, KitKat is 
> on her way over to you. Install something in her that will make her 
> listen to me, then send her on her way."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> FZ recieves Diamond's message, replying. "Hmm. Would you mind going 
> scouting for now?"
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> > Diamond::
> > 
> > She went down to the training center and activated a level 10 
> > training program.  It was one of the toughest training programs 
the 
> > center had.
> > 
> > She walked out of the training center two hours later, covered in 
> > bruises and mechfluid.  She looked like the pit, but she felt a 
lot 
> > better.  She walked down the halls, leaving a small trail of 
> fluid.  
> > She made it to her quarters and got cleaned up.  She smiled, "I 
> think 
> > thingsss will work out jussst fine."  She called up FZ," Oh great 
> > leader, what do you have for Diamond to accomplisssh today?"
> > She knew that you caught more flies with honey than with vinagar, 
> so 
> > she used a sweet tongue to get FZ to give her a job to do. She 
> wanted 
> > to kill a maximal. She killed one pred leader, now she wanted 
> another 
> > victim to play with.
